name: Approaching Zero
description:
A0, or Approaching Zero, is a side-scrolling jumping-puzzle them up, developed as a University project for Media Design School in Game maker.

A0 follows the story of an astronaut sent out by a colony that has long ago lost contact with earth. The Player must now search the dead ruin of another colonized planet to find the "Beacon", a star-map showing the way to earth, to save his people.

Featuring a parkour based exploration system which allows the player to find hidden scraps of code, which when combined allow the player to find earth much faster than they would normally playing the game.
